Nice! Works for me!

louise@pasokon:~/code/ign-msgs/build$ ign msg -i ign_msgs.Boolean
Name: ignition.msgs.Boolean
File: ignition/msgs/boolean.proto

message Boolean {
  optional .ignition.msgs.Header header = 1;
  optional bool data = 2 [default = false];
}
